author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is to include the L1 tracking algorithm (hybrid emulation) into central CMSSW. It is needed for the Phase-2 HLT TDR. It adds the following new packages: 

L1Trigger/TrackFindingTracklet/
L1Trigger/TrackFindingTMTT/

#### PR validation:

This PR is not currently part of any official workflow.
title: Include L1 track finding algorithm (for HL-LHC upgrade)
